committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 1961 Stout Street, Denver, Colorado, as the "Byron G. Rogers Federal Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Designates the Federal Building and U.S. Courthouse in Denver, Colorado, as the Byron G. Rogers Federal Building and United States Courthouse. Designates the Lowndesville Recreation Area, located within the Richard B. Russell Dam and Lake project, South Carolina and Georgia, as the Jim Rampey Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse at 1961 Stout Street, Denver, Colorado, as the "Byron G. Rogers Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
